item.title: ‘Our HOA fees are too high’: My husband and I are retired. Should we sell our $700K condo and rent instead?
item.description: “We have total combined assets of $1.5 million.”

item.title: Nearly 900,000 new homeowners are underwater on their mortgages, signaling a troubling shift in the housing market
item.description: As existing-home sales remain on track to hit a 30-year low, home prices are losing steam — and homeowners are feeling the sting.

item.title: FanDuel owner to launch prediction market as competition heats up
item.description: Flutter announces third quarter loss and downgrades guidance for full-year but the underlying earnings trend is positive.

item.title: ‘It’s unlikely to ever increase in value’: Should I give my daughter my $300K house or gift her the cash to buy it?
item.description: A reader mulls over the implications for capital gains tax, property tax and the future appreciation of the property’s value.

item.title: My husband, 73, is giving me a life estate in his home, yet leaving his son a $200K Porsche. Is this cause for divorce?
item.description: “I am not listed on his bank accounts.”
